Improve build script

TLDR: You can now always use `mvn clean deploy -DskipTests` for deploying

This commit will:
- enforce the required properties for the tomcat7-maven-plugin
- don't enforce the existence of the config.properties file as maven fails fast
  without it
- remove the different handling between deploy and redeploy
- move property display to the prepare-package goal
- when using the short `mvn deploy` and `mvn package` commands there now should
  be no goal executed more than once

Little README.md changes.

Consistent naming for example configuration files

The rules are quite simple:
- File name ending should stay the same (do not append 'example' as suffix)
- So 'example' should be a prefix
- The real file name can be optained by replacing 'example.' with ''
